org.apache.lenya.workflow.impl
Class HistoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lenya.workflow.impl.HistoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
History, WorkflowListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CMSHistory
public abstract class HistoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements History, WorkflowListener

The history of a workflow instance contains a list of all versions of the instance. A version contains

  • the state,
  • the event that caused the transition (omitted in the first version).
